message.body: Ugh Ingrid I could not find the time to put cards around in Baltimore. I'm so sorry, I will do it next time I'm around
No worries!! How was it?!
That's awesome -- is this for crane?

Actually, I didn't have a real goal in mind. I have just admired her paintings for so long, and when she liked my work on instagram, I immediately jumped at the chance to ask if I could see her studio and meet her!
Yes totally! That is really great
It's cool that you're just seeing people's work and connecting with them for fun
I had offered her a show at Hooloon when I managed it, and and she had declined bc she had a show at a gallery on the main line
And at the time, I was so disappointed...but now I'm glad! Michael couldn't steal her from me!
Yeah, it is so important to always remind myself that bad things might secretly be good things later on
Well I cannot BeLiEVe I hadn't met her before this. We know ALL the same people, are the same age, paint very similarly, etc.
It was wonderful meeting her. Adam from Vetri contacted me today as well so I sent her the pics of the studio visit- but I doubt they'd show that work
It is not traditional enough or representation enough
(Though it is quite traditional and obv from life, but it is all relative to the audience.)
So hopefully we will have some forward movement on Vetri too
also, check out my baby! ￼
Not sure if boy or girl yet but might find out next week at next sonogram which is to check for Down's syndrome hmmm
INGRID!!! That is so beautiful! It already looks so cute I can tell!!
That's great about Aubrey though, it's crazy how stuff like that works out!
and for genetic disorders etc
It rolled around! And moved it's little hands and feet! Way cute!
LOL Sofie was like 'omg your fetus looks like a fetus!' Lolololol
I told the obstetrician that that baby was the cutest thing id ever seen and that is a big statement for me bc I see puppies and kittens all day
Let me know about your bmore trip soon!
Let's grab dinner or something. Something cheap. I'll bring you takeout next week or something
Omg that is adorable. I wanna see the sonogram print in person. Yeah let's grab dinner -- you know my schedule...I don't have anywhere to be this week so just say when and I'll be there
